description:
Learn how to craft a Ent or Treant miniature for D&D or Lotr SBG in this tutorial. More cheap Dungeon and Dragons miniatures - https://tinyurl.com/y2qxwefo

The LOTR music is from https://moviethemes.net/ All credits to them for providing awesome music!

title: How to Craft an Ent / Treant Miniature for D&D (Simple & Cheap)
